tgt_original: śubhadivase  śrāddhena kulaputreṇa  kuladuhitrā vā śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena
viviktapradeśe buddhapratimāṃ  pañcopahāraiḥ saṃpūjya |  tadagre triratnebhyo
guruve ca maṇḍalakāni  kṛtvā dakṣiṇāpūrvakaṃ tīvraprasādena  triratnebhyo gurucaraṇayoś ca
prayaccha me kalyāṇamitra trīṇi  śaraṇagamanāni | upāsā-  kaśikṣāsaṃvaraṃ ca ||
